title: Countries with the largest number of cosmetic procedures 2018
summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Number of procedures in each Country on the y axis.
Country United States has the highest Number of procedures and Thailand has the lowest Number of procedures.
The Number of procedures of Country United States is 31.13% larger than the minimum value at Thailand.
min_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Number of procedures in each Country on the y axis.
The Number of procedures is highest at Country United States and lowest at Country Thailand.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Number of procedures in each Country on the y axis.
Country United States has the highest Number of procedures and Thailand has the lowest Number of procedures.

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of procedures for 10 number of Countrys.
The Number of procedures is highest at Country United States and lowest at Country Thailand.
Country Brazil has the second highest value for Number of procedures.
The Number of procedures of Country United States is 31.13% larger than the minimum value at Thailand.
Country United States is higher than any other Countrys with value 4361867.0, followed by Brazil, and Mexico. Down to Country Thailand with the lowest value 140123.0.
The Country Thailand has 3.73 times less Number of procedures than average.
Summing up the values of all Countrys, we get total 11705193.0.
